channel.title: Half-Life 2 VPK compatible with older black mesa mod?
channel.description:
Anyone got Black Mesa v1.0 (the free version) working with new current Half-Life 2 VPK pipeline files?
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa/downloads[/url] As you can see, Black Mesa was working with Half-Life 2 back in 2012. But I just tried now with my current Half-Life 2 and all I get is a black screen.
Does anyone know whether older mods are not compatible with new Half-Life 2 VPK?
